nodes.documentation:
Constructor function
     * Initializes contract with initial supply tokens to the creator of the contract
nodes.name: TokenERC20

nodes.documentation: Internal transfer, only can be called by this contract
nodes.name: _transfer

nodes.documentation:
Transfer tokens
     * Send `_value` tokens to `_to` from your account
     * @param _to The address of the recipient
@param _value the amount to send
nodes.name: transfer
transferFrom

nodes.documentation:
Set allowance for other address
     * Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens on your behalf
     * @param _spender The address authorized to spend
@param _value the max amount they can spend
nodes.name: approve
approveAndCall

nodes.documentation:
Destroy tokens
     * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly
     * @param _value the amount of money to burn
nodes.name: burn

nodes.documentation:
Destroy tokens from other account
     * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`.
     * @param _from the address of the sender
@param _value the amount of money to burn
nodes.name: burnFrom

nodes.documentation:
Sends the employee all the tokens and ETH based on their yearly salary and allocations.
Only callable once a month
